Xvalue_coded_name_first: N - TB Not suspected,Y - TB Suspected,C - TB confirmed NOT on TB treatment,Rx - TB confirmed on TB Rx

A1a - TDF + 3TC + DTG (1st Line),A1b - TDF + 3TC + EFV (1st Line),A1c - ABC + 3TC + DTG (1st Line),A1d - AZT + 3TC + EFV (1st Line),A2a -  AZT + 3TC + DTG (2nd Line),A2b - AZT + 3TC + LPV/r (2nd Line),A2c - AZT + 3TC + ATV/r (2nd Line),A2d - TDF + 3TC + LPV/r (2nd Line),A2e - TDF + 3TC + DRV/r (2nd Line)
C - CPT only,I - TPT only,CI - CPT + TPT
1 - HIV clinic-based ART,2 - Fast-track ART,3 - Facility-based adherence club,4 - Community ART Distribution point,5 - Peer-led community ART group,6 - Patient-led community ART group
Ongoing - Exclusive,Ongoing - Mixed/Complementary,Stopped - In last 6 weeks,Stopped - Over 6 weeks age
Confirmed - Not infected,Confirmed - Infected ART,Not confirmed - Not ART eligible,Not confirmed - PSHD
